{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Airlink101 |model=AR360W3G |upc=658729080386 |asin=B00186CEF4 |est_release_date=04/21/2008 |fcc_date=06/07/2006 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=AMIT |manuf_model=WMQ138AM |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PBLWL533M |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=AMRISC |cpu1_model=20000;AMRISC 20000, R3210GCL3H; |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=EN29LV320T-70TCP |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model=IS42S16160B-6T |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (32-bit),Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_minipci_num=1 |wi1_module=AMIT WL533MAM |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2561S |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2527 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=IC+ |eth_chip2_model=IP101A |eth_chip3_brand=IC+ |eth_chip3_model=IP101A |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags=3G capable |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_pass=admin |oui=00:50:18 |oui_eth=00:50:18 |default_ch= }} [http://www.airlink101.com/products/ar360w3g.php Product page]
[http://www.airlink101.com/download/download_links/m-ar360w3g.pdf Manual] OEM AMIT WMQ138AM The default SSID appears to be '''default'''. [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=58518 On the OpenWrt forums], [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=15410 and again] [http://www.lemmke.org/arl/DATA/hardware/other/small_network_appliances/small_network_appliances.4.en.html On the Lemmke list]
